item.title: Abouttest
item.description: MÃ­nimo is a Spanish word that roughly translate to Minimal. Minimo is a minimalist theme for Hugo. Minimo keeps the focus on your content and lets it shine!

item.title: JMP
item.description: 1. Statistical Inference on Partially Linear Panel Model under Unobserved Linearity (Job Market Paper) Abstract: A new statistical procedure, based on a modified spline basis, is proposed to identify the linear components in the panel data model with fixed effects. Under some mild assumptions, the proposed procedure is shown to consistently estimate the underlying regression function, correctly select the linear components, and effectively conduct the statistical inference. When compared to existing methods for detection of linearity in the panel model, our approach is demonstrated to be theoretically justified as well as practically convenient.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Previous Semesters STAT 5378 – Stochastic Processes STAT 5376 – Statistical Machine Leraning Fall 2021 STAT 5328 – Intermediate Mathematical Statistics I

item.title: Miscellaneous
item.description: Technically speaking, this personal website is powered by Hugo and modified based on Minimo Theme. The source code is available on my Github. I am also a Semi-Magician. In my spare time, I enjoy practicing sleight of hand tricks with playing cards.
